text:
OS: NetBSD-1.5 (www.netbsd.org)
Already installed: Apache-2.0.15
		   Jakarta-Ant-3.1
		   Jakarta-ServletAPI-3.2.1
		   Jakarta-Tomcat-3.1.1

INPUT:
Download jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1-src.tar.gz
tar -zxf jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1-src.tar.gz 
cd jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1-src/src/native/apache2.0/
apxs -c -o mod_jserv.so *.c

OUTPUT:
apxs:Error: 0 31 21 20 5 4 3 2 0prefix)/bin/httpd not found or not executable

COMMENT:
Build terminates and returns to prompt. The file httpd is located in
/usr/pkg/bin and is executable by user, group and other.
creator: oasfour@email.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
That seems a apxs problem ( it's supposed to work ). Try
jakarta-tomcat-connectors, it has a configure script that may solve your
problem.
